doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: MIPS32 Configurable Processor Model

doctext.name: txt_1
doctext.text: If you need other variants, these models can be obtained from www.OVPworld.org/MIPSuser.

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Usage of binary model under license governing simulator usage. Source of model available under Imperas Software License Agreement.

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: If this model is not part of your installation, then it is available for download from www.OVPworld.org/MIPSuser.

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Models have been validated correct as part of the MIPS Verified program and run through the MIPS AVP test programs

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Both MIPS32 and microMIPS32 Instruction sets implemented

doctext.name: txt_1
doctext.text: MMU Type: Fixed Mapping

doctext.name: txt_2
doctext.text: Vectored interrupts implemented

doctext.name: txt_3
doctext.text: MCU ASE implemented

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Processor variant

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Select cache model mode

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Cache debug flags

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Pointer to platform-provided BIU cache info structure

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Load a MIPS hex file (test-mode)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Enable MIPS-specific magic Pass/Fail opcodes (specific for AVP test termination)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: When set, cache index ops do not generate TLB exceptions

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Enable MIPS-format trace output

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override whether processor implements supervisor mode

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override bus error exception behavior. When true, accesses of memory not defined by platform will cause bus error exceptions

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the MMU type to fixed mapping when true (sets Config.MT=3, Config.KU/K23=2 and Config1.MMUSizeM1=0)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the DSP-present configuration when true (sets Config3.DSPP/DSP2P=0)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the CMP-Present configuration when true (sets Config3.CMGCR and GCR_BASE to 0)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the FP-Present configuration when true (sets Config1.FP to 0)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the FTLBEn configuration when true (disable FTLB)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Enable to specify ISA model (reset address from ELF, all coprocessors enabled)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Deprecated - Instead set config1MMUSizeM1 to maximum value to improve performance

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specify number of ITC cells present (MT cores only)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specify number of ITC FIFO cells in reference ITC implementation (MT cores only)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Enable multi-threaded FPU (1:old mttc1 behavior, 2:new mttc1 behavior)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Enable to specify that the FPU supports denormal operands and results

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specifies the maximum TCs initially on VPE0

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Number of regions for memory protection unit

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override MVPConf0.PVPE

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override MVPConf0.PTC

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override MVPConf0.PCP

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override MVPConf0.TCP

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Enable MIPS-Unified Hosting interface

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specifies UHI arguments string seperated by spaces

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specifies UHI jailroot

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Enable Design Verification mode

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Enable MIPS-specific magic Pass/Fail opcodes

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Enable trickbox addresses (specific for AVP)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Disable FPU exceptions

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specifies width in bits of COP2 registers (32 or 64)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specifies COP2 dynamically-loaded object (.so/.dll) defining COP2 instructions

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specifies UDI configuration attribute

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specifies UDI dynamically-loaded object (.so/.dll) defining UDI instructions

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Enables vectored interrupts (sets Config3 VInt)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Enables the use of an external interrupt controller (sets Config3 VEIC)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the root MMU type to fixed mapping when true (sets Config.MT=3 and Config.KU/K23=2)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the root MMUSizeM1 field in Config1 register (number of MMU entries-1)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the HSS field in SRSCtl register (number of shadow register sets)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the PS field in FIR register

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the Has2008 field in FIR register

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the Company Options field in PRId register

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the Revision field in PRId register

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the IPTI field in IntCtl register

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the IPFDC field in IntCtl register

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the IPPCI field in IntCtl register

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specify number of WatchLo/WatchHi register pairs

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specify number of Virtual Cores to be present

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specify number of Virtual Cores to be running

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specify first shared TLB Index between Virtual Cores

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specify Fast Debug Channel (dummy implementation)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specify the BEV Exception Base address. (use GCR_Cx_RESET_BASE on CMP processors)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Set to one to use ExceptionBase[29:12] as the corresponding BEV address bits

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specify LSB position of GCR_Cx_RESET_EXT_BASE.BEVExceptionBaseMask field. Only used when SegCtl present

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Set to one to reset into non-legacy address map and BEV location. Only used when non-CMP and SegCtl present

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specify the ExceptionBaseMask value used for bits [27:firstBEVExceptionBaseMaskBit]. Only used when non-CMP and SegCtl present

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Bits [35:29] of the physical address for the BEV overlays. Only used when non-CMP and SegCtl present
